title: Mol CX: Mathieu van der Poel Buries Wout van Aert, Lucinda Brand Unrivaled
content:
In the first clash between two of the 'Big Three,' the reigning world champion dances through sandpits of Mol. Brand delivers a controlled victory in the women's race.

Read the full article at Mol CX: Mathieu van der Poel Buries Wout van Aert, Lucinda Brand Unrivaled on Velo.
author: ahood
